message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $850,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. I'm confident it will be a great asset for your business. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I understand your position, but $700,000 is simply too low for me.  The product's worth is considerably higher.  I'm willing to come down to $750,000, which is still a fair compromise.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I understand that you think the product is worth more, but I'm still not convinced that $750,000 is the right price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $725,000. That's my final offer.
